name: CORONA VIRUS:HELL ON EARTH FPS WAD
name_original: CORONA VIRUS:HELL ON EARTH FPS WAD
description:
Corona Virus has dominated the whole world, and the CORONA SLAYER is the only one who can defeat the CORONA VIRUS.

In celebration of Doom Eternal's launch and the sadness from Corona Virus, I present my new game/wad. Hope you guys like this shit.

And wash your fucking hand.
